verses.roman:
mahārāṣṭrīya vipra āise prabhu dekhibāre
prabhura rūpa-prema dekhi' haya camatkāre

synonyms: mahārāṣṭrīya—belonging to the Mahārāṣṭra state; vipra—one brāhmaṇa; āise—comes; prabhu dekhibāre—to see Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rūpa-prema—beauty and ecstatic love; dekhi'-seeing; haya camatkāre—becomes astonished.
translation: At Vārāṇasī there was a Mahārāṣṭrīyan brāhmaṇa who used to come daily to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. This brāhmaṇa was simply astonished to see the Lord's personal beauty and ecstatic love for Kṛṣṇa.
